<p><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">umask</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">值一共有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:DengXian;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">组数字，其中第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">组数字用于定义特殊权限，我们一般不予考虑，与一般权限有关的是后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">组数字。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">默认情况下，对于目录，用户所能拥有的最大权限是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">777</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">；对于文件，用户所能拥有的最大权限是目录的最大权限去掉执行权限，即</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">666</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">x</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">执行权限对于目录是必须的，没有执行权限就无法进入目录，而对于文件则不必默认赋予</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">x</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">执行权限。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">root</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:DengXian;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">用户，他的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">umask</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">值是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">022</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">root</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">用户创建目录时，默认的权限就是用最大权限</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">777</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">去掉相应位置的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">umask</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">值权限，即对于所有者不必去掉任何权限，对于所属组要去掉</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">w</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">权限，对于其他用户也要去掉</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">w</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">权限，所以目录的默认权限就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">755</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">；当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">root</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">用户创建文件时，默认的权限则是用最大权限</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">666</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">去掉相应位置的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">umask</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">值，即文件的默认权限是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt">644</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:DengXian;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
DengXian;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Calibri",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
Calibri;mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri;mso-font-kerning:0pt">①</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">以二进制方式换算：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
